short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to save and import your chess.com games into lichess for free analysis!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I noticed that some other Chess.com to Lichess tools were bugged and wanted to create one myself. In addition, my chrome extension allows users to save their games after creating an account using their email address and passwords.
